mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( reply_board_num, reply_content, replyer ) VALUES ( #{boardNum}, #{replyContent}, #{replyer} )
mapper.select: SELECT reply_num AS replyNum, reply_board_num AS boardNum, reply_content AS replyContent, replyer AS replyer, reply_Date AS replyDate, userName AS replyUserName FROM reply r, user u WHERE r.replyer = u.userId AND reply_board_num = #{boardNum} ORDER BY reply_num DESC LIMIT #{startRow} , #{pageScale}
